name: Dark Ascending
description:
-Story:
Waking up in a laboratory, called a test subject, your task is to try new virus samples and participate in a game to entertain the viewer.

-Mechanic:
The horror and entertainment genre seemed like two completely different concepts, but no, our game would prove the opposite.
The combination of horror and entertainment genre creates a unique game unique to the market. The game has a unique style with a half-2d and half-3d style of play, ensuring no collisions.
This is a game created from creativity.

-Features:
3d horror and puzzle gameplay
2d entertainment mechanism
